DOC.criteria: Age > 18 year age Written inform consent obtain Confirmed diagnosis stage 24 breast , prostate , colorectal cancer , ( OR ) prior history cancer Stage 24 treatment naive , metastatic , secondary , recurrent cancer patient Able undergo blood collection prior initiation chemotherapy treatment , ( OR ) able provide blood sample subject noncancer control subject Patients unable understand research protocol and/or provide inform consent .
